title: Ghost Game Character Voice Pack
description: Introducing Game Character Ghost, a unique collection of ghost voiceover and fantasy styled game and trailer speaking and sound FX files featuring a male antagonist inspired by medieval fantasy MMO and RPG games.
longDescription:
Audio Demos

No need to call upon the King of the dead & raise the ancient ghost armies of old to defeat your enemies in your next production. Game Character Ghost voice over sound library provides you with more than 776 immersive, game-ready voiceover sound files, vocalizations, battle cries, custom dialogue lines, and everything needed to create interactive & compelling cinematic scenes, and outstanding game-play audio experiences.


The Ghost’s voice can be described as an ethereal being, raspy, dynamic, dark, and rich with texture. Perfect for a villain, enemy boss, NPC, or antagonist character in your next game, project or production. His voice is ready to go out of the box but is clean enough for further processing plus you get both wet and dry versions of the entire library so you can have the ability to customize how he sounds. All of the recordings are delivered in 96khz/24bit .wav file format, giving you the best quality for heavy sound editing, pitching shifting and fx processing while keeping a top notch level of clarity and precision.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 776 fantasy character voice-over audio files
  • 1.2 GB of vocal samples
  • Includes both dry and wet versions of each file
  • Game Character Voice-Over Sound Effects Library
  • Perfect for fantasy games, film, and trailers
  • 48 battle cries and sayings
  • 18 breathing types – deep, quick, shallow, slow to quick, etc.
  • 30 coughs – wheezy, muffled, long, dusty, wet, clearing, explosive
  • 24 crying sounds – heartfelt, sobbing, big, pitiful, short
  • 264 immersive dialogue lines for trailers and games like my armies shall blacken the earth, let the embrace of death sing you to sleep
  • 30 fight vocals – grunt, hiss, swing, attack & more
  • 30 jumping vocalizations – windup, big, quick, double jump, power jump
  • 30 laughing voice files – hearty, amused, breathy, evil, explosive
  • 42 pain vocals – breathy, stabbed, wound, pain, and death sayings like Finally my ends has come
  • 260 stock dialogue lines for basic interactions in-game like no, negative, hold here, as you command & many more

Number of Audio Waves: 776

Number of Audio Cues: 776

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX Loop: No

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, iOS, Android, Xbox One, Oculus, SteamVR / HTC Vive, Gear VR, Linux, HTML5

Documentation: Content List
